Start Code

{% raw %}

start_code[source]

start_code(port:"Port to Start Code"=10000, password:"Password to Start Code"=None)

Starts Code Server

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Start Jupyter

{% raw %}

start_jupyter[source]

start_jupyter(port:"Port to Start Jupyter"=9000, ui:"Interface to start"='notebook')

Starts Jupyter

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Start Pluto

{% raw %}

start_pluto[source]

start_pluto(port:"Port to Start Jupyter"=9000)

Starts Pluto.jl reactive notebook

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
